form.label: Switch Power Consumption
form.description: Filter using any field [ switchname=All Switches/select one from the dropdown ]

fieldset.input:
filter: *-->All Switches switchname switchname
source="arista_switch_inventory" | stats count by switchname | sort switchname 0

search.query: sourcetype="arista_switch_inventory" AristaPSUPowerConsumption switchname=$switchName$ | stats latest(totalInputPower) as inputPower, latest(totalOutputPower) as outputPower, latest(totalPowerEfficiency) as powerEfficiency(%), sparkline(max(totalInputPower)) as inputPowerHistory, sparkline(max(totalOutputPower)) as outputPowerHistory, sparkline(max(eval(rtrim(totalPowerEfficiency,"%")))) as powerEfficiencyHistory by switchname | table switchname,inputPower,inputPowerHistory,outputPower,outputPowerHistory,powerEfficiency(%),powerEfficiencyHistory
